titles.title: PROTECT Act of 2025
PROTECT Act of 2025
Providing Rigorous Oversight Through Evaluation of Concerning Transactions Act of 2025
A bill to require the review by the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States of greenfield and brownfield investments by foreign countries of concern.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
